casebody.data:
[511] [*] ROSEVELT against GARDINER. Mr. Hornbloioer

moved for leave to amend the notice given in this cause of special matter under the plea of the general issue.

Mr. Van Arsdale

opposed this motion, on the ground that notice is not amendable, and cited Barnes, 294-

By the Court.

Notice in this case, is in the nature of pleadings, and therefore amendable; take your rule.

Rule allowed.
